comment._content: www.smithsonianmag.com/history-archaeology/pietown.html?c... Great article with the history of Pie Town inspired by these photographs.

comment.author: 45791749@N00
comment._content: I think this is more like what the Brokeback cowboys would/should have looked: a little more ragged and rugged than Heath and Jake were dressed.

comment.author: 15614078@N06
comment._content: My mother has an unfinished Stetson that she got at Girl Scout camp in 1964, and it now looks a whole lot like that hat. (But it's 45 years old and still wearable!) He does kind of look like Lyle Lovett!
